EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying a user when they have been reassigned identities from an existing certification.

Argument.name: certificationName
Argument.Description: The name of the Certification containing the items to reassign.

Argument.name: certification
Argument.Description: The Certification object containing the items to reassign.

Argument.name: owner
Argument.Description: The Identity object receiving the reassignment request.

Argument.name: numNewIdentities
Argument.Description: Number of identities reassigned, passed as a string.

Argument.name: requesterName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that requested the reassignment.

EmailTemplate.Subject: New certification reassignment request: $certificationName
